price: 91. Waxaa aniga la I amray sideedaba in aan caabudo Rabbiga magaaladaan27 (Makkah) ee ah Kan xurmada u yeelay oo iska leh wax walba. Waxaana la I amray inaan ka mid ahaado Muslimiinta (kuwa isu dhiiba Alle ee u hoggaansan).
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡبَلۡدَةِ ٱلَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: 27. Waxaa loola jeedaa Makkah iyo hareeraheeda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innamā umir'tu an aʿbuda rabba hādhihi al-baldati alladhī ḥarramahā walahu kullu shayin wa-umir'tu an akūna mina al-mus'limīna
